url: pfsrd://NPC Codex/Rules/Core Class NPCs/Paladin/Paladins/Haughty Avenger/Nyalil Stormstrike

sections.body: Nyalil sees herself as a full elf, not a half-breed. She so thoroughly rejects her human side that she treats humans as lesser creatures—but can be so charming that humans often love her anyway.
Nyalil is often in the company of elven knights, wizards, and priests, who only halfway accept her.
Nyalil is both charming and arrogant, and her words are often a stream of veiled insultsand clever quips, especially when she's dealing with humans.

name: Nyalil Stormstrike
